FUNCTION_BLOCK ExampleDataModel
Simple âdata modelâ example, contains four memory-separated sections containg two:
- âdiscrete inputsâ
- âcoilsâ
- âinput registersâ
- âholding registersâ
âdata itemâ start index for all sections is 5
